marklogic.body: Well, I finally had a chance to watch last Sunday's episode. First I have to say, COME ON ROXY! At the very least you are from a small town, country area and yet you know nothing about handling mayonaise? Meanwhile, other things are starting to Heat up, the first of which is Claudia Joy. She has definitely gotten the blip on her radar, so hopefully she (and maybe the Lucci!) will find a way to take care of that conniving woman. She's only been in for two episodes (the General's wife) but I already hate her. She reminds me of those girls we all hated in high school, constantly pretending to be someone's "friend" until she gets what she wants and then she disappears and, if caught, pulls out the baby blues and her daddy who is completely awed by his little princess.Anyway, only three days until the next episode. Go, Claudia! And good luck to Roxy with her new friend.
